statements: SELECT * FROM shipping_log WHERE id = 1;
SELECT incident_description, timestamp FROM shipping_log WHERE id = 2;
SELECT resolution FROM shipping_log WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM shipping_log WHERE id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, incident_description, resolution FROM shipping_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM shipping_log WHERE id = 1;
SELECT incident_description, timestamp FROM shipping_log WHERE resolution IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM shipping_log;
SELECT id, incident_description, resolution, timestamp FROM shipping_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, incident_description FROM shipping_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM shipping_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description FROM shipping_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM shipping_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT description, incident_date FROM shipping_incidents WHERE incident_id = 'abcde';
SELECT incident_id, description, incident_date FROM shipping_incidents WHERE description LIKE '%delayed%';
SELECT * FROM shipping_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM shipping_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM resolution_log JOIN shipping_incidents ON resolution_log.incident_id = shipping_incidents.incident_id ORDER BY resolution_date ASC;
SELECT resolution_desc FROM resolution_log WHERE resolution_status = 'Resolved' AND resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM shipping_incidents;
SELECT * FROM ShippingIncidents LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_date, ship_name FROM ShippingIncidents WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM ShippingResolutions WHERE resolution_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, description FROM ShippingIncidents WHERE ship_name = 'CargoShip';
SELECT * FROM ShippingLogs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ShippingIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, description, ship_name FROM ShippingIncidents WHERE resolved = true;
SELECT * FROM ShippingResolutions WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT s.incident_id, s.description, r.resolution_details FROM ShippingIncidents s JOIN ShippingResolutions r ON s.incident_id = r.incident_id WHERE r.resolved_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM ShippingLogs WHERE log_date >= '2022-07-01' AND log_details LIKE '%damage%' ORDER BY log_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM incident_logs;
SELECT id, incident_description, date_occurred FROM incident_logs ORDER BY date_occurred DESC;
SELECT agent_id, name, email FROM shipping_agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM incident_categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%security%';

SELECT incident_logs.id, incident_description, resolution, name FROM incident_logs JOIN incident_assignments ON incident_logs.id = incident_assignments.incident_id JOIN shipping_agents ON incident_assignments.agent_id = shipping_agents.agent_id;
SELECT * FROM incident_logs WHERE date_occurred > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_occurred DESC;

SELECT i.incident_description, i.resolution, a.name FROM incident_logs i JOIN incident_assignments ia ON i.id = ia.incident_id JOIN shipping_agents a ON ia.agent_id = a.agent_id WHERE ia.date_assigned >= '2022-01-01' AND ia.date_assigned <= '2022-03-01';

SELECT il.incident_description, ia.date_assigned, s.name FROM incident_logs il JOIN incident_assignments ia ON il.id = ia.incident_id JOIN shipping_agents s ON ia.agent_id = s.agent_id WHERE il.date_occurred BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY ia.date_assigned DESC;

SELECT ic.category_id, ic.category_name, COUNT(ia.incident_id) AS total_incidents FROM incident_categories ic LEFT JOIN incident_assignments ia ON ic.category_id = ia.agent_id GROUP BY ic.category_id, ic.category_name ORDER BY total_incidents DESC;

SELECT ia.date_assigned, il.incident_description, sa.name, sa.email FROM incident_assignments ia JOIN incident_logs il ON ia.incident_id = il.id JOIN shipping_agents sa ON ia.agent_id = sa.agent_id WHERE sa.phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM shipping_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM shipping_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM incidents_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT incident_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM incident_logs GROUP BY incident_id HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 2;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM shipping_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, location, description FROM shipping_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01' AND incident_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT category_name, COUNT(incident_id) FROM incidents_categories JOIN shipping_incidents ON incidents_categories.category_id = shipping_incidents.incident_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY COUNT(incident_id) DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, COUNT(log_id) FROM employees LEFT JOIN incident_logs ON employees.employee_id = incident_logs.log_id GROUP BY employee_name, employee_role;
SELECT resolution_details FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date IS NULL ORDER BY resolution_id ASC LIMIT 3;
